item.title: CNBC said Obama needs to embrace Bitcoin soon | HolyTransaction
item.description:
CNBC said Obama needs to embrace Bitcoin soon | HolyTransaction

According to a CNBC writer President Barack Obama needs to embrace Bitcoin soon. In fact, some days ago Barth Chilton , former commissioner of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) and senior policy advisor at the global law firm DLA Piper, wrote that the Obama administration should now move on bitcoin and the blockchain.

item.title: Bitcoin Is the Original DAO - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Bitcoin Is the Original DAO - Bitcoinist.net

Decentralized autonomous organizations have received much attention in recent weeks since Ethereum launched its new Decentralized Autonomous Organization platform, featuring projects such as Slock.it and Digix, among others. Ethereum has chosen to ignore the elephant in the room in its press releases: there's another DAO. It's Bitcoin, and it's the biggest blockchain technology around.

item.title: Hong Kong Bitcoin Exchange ANX Touts 'Easy As Email' Blockchain Service
item.description:
Hong Kong Bitcoin Exchange ANX Touts 'Easy As Email' Blockchain Service

ANX International, a Hong Kong-based virtual-currency trading startup and fintech company, is inviting people to issue their own digital assets using blockchain technology, according to Bloomberg. The service is intended to make setting up a blockchain-based assets and trading network as easy as signing up for an email account.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Range Tightened, Trades Ready - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Range Tightened, Trades Ready - NEWSBTC

Here's what are we looking to trade in the bitcoin price for this evening's session out of Europe. We are approaching the close of the European session in the bitcoin price, and one look at action throughout the day reveals that there has been very little worth trading.

item.title: DAO Makes History, Raises $130 Million, Breaking All Records
item.description:
DAO Makes History, Raises $130 Million, Breaking All Records

The millennial generation is experiencing history in the making as they flock in amazing numbers - almost 5,000 members on the DAO slack channel - to fund one of the most promising decentralized autonomous organizations.

item.title: Former Citadel Technology CEO Joins Blockchain Developer Axoni
item.description:
Former Citadel Technology CEO Joins Blockchain Developer Axoni

New York-based blockchain solutions provider Axoni announced today the appointment of Thomas Chippas as chief operating officer. Chippas has a long track record in the finance and trading industry; CEO of high-frequency trading firm Citadel Technology; Managing Director at Barclays Capital and Deutsche Bank; Principal of Electronic Trading Services at Bank of America.

item.title: Blockchain Announces Thunder Network to Tackle Slow Bitcoin Transactions - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Blockchain Announces Thunder Network to Tackle Slow Bitcoin Transactions - NEWSBTC

Blockchain has announced the alpha release of its latest Thunder Network capable of handling loads of off-chain transactions in a faster and more economical way compared to the present day Bitcoin blockchain. Blockchain, the Bitcoin wallet company has announced the alpha release of its latest Thunder Network, a payment channel technology designed to accelerate bitcoin transactions over the blockchain.

item.title: Denmark's CCEDK to Cease Trading, Reopen as Finance Incubator
item.description:
Denmark's CCEDK to Cease Trading, Reopen as Finance Incubator

Pioneering Danish Bitcoin exchange CCEDK is to close down and reopen as a financial gateway for OpenLedger, its creator has announced. Also read: Digix: Gold-Backed Ethereum Smart Contracts for All Ronny Boesing, who started the exchange in 2014, released the news to users in a statement Friday.

item.title: Tendermint Exploring Possible Public Blockchain Launch - CoinDesk
item.description:
Tendermint Exploring Possible Public Blockchain Launch - CoinDesk

Blockchain app specialist Tendermint is in the early stages of preparing to launch a public blockchain that could find it issuing tokens in a bid to create a platform comparable to bitcoin or Ethereum with alternative capabilities.

item.title: How does the thunder network work? And how does it keep things decentralized?
item.description:
How does the thunder network work? And how does it keep things decentralized?

Bitcoin Stack Exchange is a question and answer site for Bitcoin crypto-currency enthusiasts. It's 100% free, no registration required.
